question: A farmer has taken a loan for a paddy crop in the beginning of the Rabi Season and has not made a repayment. In which of the following situations, if Installment or interest is not paid for this loan, it would become a NPA (Non Performing Asset)?
option2: 90 Days from the end of the Rabi Season
option3: 1 crop season from the due date
option4: 2 crop seasons from the due date
answer: 2 crop seasons from the due date
